headers.Access-Control-Allow-Headers: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version, Authorization, Cookie
headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss: https://nearby-frontend-psi.vercel.app wss://nearby-backend.vercel.app ws: wss:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';
